summary: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.
cast: Stephanie Leonidas|Jason Barry|Rob Brydon|Gina McKee|Dora Bryan|Stephen Fry|Andy Hamilton|Simon Harvey|Lenny Henry|Robert Llewellyn|Eryl Maynard|Eve Pearce|Nik Robson|Victoria Williams|Rick Allen|Gina D'Angelo|Simon Schofield|Silvia Fratelli|Lina Johansson|Emma Noris|Peachi Pangea|Mark Tate|Richard Thompson|Robin Thompson|Iain Ballamy|Chris Batchelor|Stian Carstensen|Martin France|Stuart Hall|Dave Powell|Trifon Trifanov|Peter Borroughs|Rusty Goffe|Kerry Jay|Fiona Reynard|Nick Dainton|Nick Jackson|Mark Perry|Kate Robbins|Stuart St. Paul
title: La máscara de cristal
